transcript: And I was pulling my hair out. I was like oh my god So I just had to finish the majors and now they're like why are you engineering majoring? And why are you working trying to work at a restaurant? It's like I don't know just give me the damn job

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: and I was pulling my hair out and it was like, oh my God.  So I just had to finish the major so now they're like, why are you an engineering major, and why are you working, trying to work at a restaurant.  And it's like I don't know just give me the damn job.
